resources.string: Yes! The mobile account center was designed with security in mind. This means that your information is encrypted and we will not reveal your full account number on the mobile site. Each time you log in we will authenticate you with your user ID and password and your session will time-out after a period of inactivity.
What do I need to log in to Discover Mobile?
To log in, use the same User ID and Password that you have set up at DiscoverBank.com.
